resources.string: Please create or select a presentation.
Please enter a name for the new presentation.
Please enter new name for the presentation.
No name has been given for presentation.
No external storage device available although it is required.
File manager could not be opened.
At least one presentation must stay to be used as draft.

On the right side a list of existing presentations is shown. Clicking on an entry will load that presentation. A context menu for a presention is shown if it is selected by long click. This menu allows 
- starting 
- creating a new presentation with selected one used as draft 
- renaming 
- deleting
 of given presentation. Concept of editor is that any presentation can be used as draft to create new ones - using the design of the draft, too. To create a new design please ask your web designer. The directory where selected presentation is stored is shown above.

This application has been developped and created as an off-time-project. 
 
Project is free under GPL2 license. Ideas, error reports and co-developpers are very welcome. 
Changes committed via signoff (git commit -s) will be adopted. Please send patches (git format-patch -s) per eMail to: fullscreen-presentation@hoffmann-projects.de

Editor "Fullscreen-Presentation" is released under open source license GPL2. 
URL: https://github.com/00091701/FullscreenPresentation-Mono 
 
A fork of Google project "Google IO 2012 slides" is used for this project. That project is licensed under Apache 2.0. 
URL of project: https://code.google.com/p/io-2012-slides 
URL of fork: https://github.com/00091701/GoogleIO-2012-slides-fork
